Kun aktuelle søkere vil bli kontaktet.

100% stilling

enfritekst.fritekst: Vi søker personer som er fleksible, punktlig og kvalitetsbevisst som er interessert i å jobbe som tilkallingsvikar på dagtid.
Stortsett dagtid og ukedager, men kan forekomme kvelds- og helgeoppdrag.

• erfaring fra renholdsarbeid er en fordel men ikke nødvendig
  • gode norskspråkkunskaper (evt svensk) Kan kompenseres med gode engelsk språkkunnskaper.
  • førerkort kl B

• opptatt av å yte og levere kvalitet

  • engasjert og godt humør
  • punktlig

For å søke stillingen benytter du linken i annonsen eller går inn på www.personalhuset.no. Kun elektroniske søknader via vårt nettsystem vil bli vurdert!

enfritekst.fritekst: For our client within the oil and gas industry, we are looking for a Subsea Supervisor in a longterm assignment. The Sub Sea Engineer position is primarily Offshore based on a 2 Weeks Offshore Duty, 4 Weeks Time Off rotation cycle.

• Ensure that the Vetco supplied Horizontal Christmas Tree system equipment is prepared and ready for installation on subsea well heads as per the completion schedule and that the Drillpipe Landing String and Workover Landing strings are prepared for use. Monitoring of spare parts levels and equipment maintenance, ROV operations and IWOCS operations throughout the subsea equipment and completion installation phase.
  • The position will require commitment to the HSE Directives when carrying out the responsibilities. This is done by actively making sure that all work is planned with safety in focus including:
  • Ensure good and sound engineering practices are used.
  • Participate in and make visible HSSE expectations within the team, both in the planning and execution phase.
  • Participate in offshore rig HSSE meetings and actively participate in rig safety plans and processes.
  • Compliance with DWOP and ETP documentation

• B.Sc. in a Petrotechnical discipline or equivalent technical qualification.
  • Or Minimum 10 years experience in Subsea HXT or VXT installation and workover operations.
  • Experience in Vetco Horizontal Christmas Tree systems an advantage.
  • Experience in Sentree 7 or ELSA SSTT operations and deployment an advantage.
  • Experience in Subsea tubing hanger installation by Drillpipe Landing strings an advantage.
  • Experience in Subsea well completion equipment and interventions is an advantage.
  • Experience in ROV operations oversight and IWOCS operations oversight is a requirement.
  • Experience in the use of Tension Frames is a requirement.
  • Valid IWCF Well Intervention Level 3 Combined Well Control Certification, OLF Offshore Survival Certification, Offshore Medical to Norwegian Sector are required and should be still valid for a minimum of 1 year from August 1st 2011.

• Ability to promote open and effective communication within the Skarv Completion & Subsea team, and offshore with Drilling and rig personnel in English and preferably also in Norwegian.
  • Team work.
  • Be familiar with using a PC and the majority of Microsoft Windows software.

enfritekst.fritekst: For our client within the oil and gas industry, we are looking for a Senior Process Engineer in a longterm assignment.

• To review the FEED documents and proactively pinpoint the issues that can be improved, and provide innovative solutions.
  • Act as a Technical Advisor to the process team during project execution phase and identify the critical issues and provide proactive and innovative solutions.
  • Support process engineers in daily tasks and help Process Lead Engineer to deal with technical issues during the project.
  • Needs to be conversant with oil and gas international standards and specification, NORSOK, and Statoil internal specifications.
  • Good experience with HYSYS steady state simulation and FLARENET software.
  • Participate in HAZOP and help in closing out process related action points.
  • Provide guidance and direction to junior members of the team on technical issues.
  • Help Sr Process Engineers in defining scenarios for Control Valve and PSV calculations.
  • Provide input to other discipline and review and commenting of document from other discipline sent for IDC

• Master or PhD Degree Chemical Process Engineering
  • Minimum10 years of experience in Process Engineering Design
  • Experience in HYSYS and FlareNet
  • Good language skills in Norwegian and English
  • Valid offshore certificate

• Bud (levering av post og pakker til faste kunder)
  • Ha korrespondanse med kunder via mail
Mandag til fredag fra kl. 06:15-10:00 - dette er et lengre vikariat med mulighet for fast ansettelse.

  • Erfaring fra lignende arbeid

CV'er behandles fortløpende.

enfritekst.fritekst:
For våre kunder, en butikk med tilholdsted Askøy utenfor Bergen og en butikk i Fyllingsdalen søker vi nå etter to personer som er interessert i å jobbe fast to dager per uke.
For butikken på Askøy er dette henholdsvis onsdager og torsdager, mens for butikken i fyllingsdalen er det tirsdager og onsdager.
Har du erfaring fra butikk er dette en fordel, men ikke et krav da grundig opplæring vil bli gitt. Arbeidsoppgavene vil være å plassere varer i butikken, hjelpe kunder og kassebehandling.
Som person er du kvikk og engasjert, ikke redd for å ta i et tak og er utpreget serviceinnstilt!
Høres dette ut som en passende jobb for deg? Ikke nøl med å ta kontakt!

enfritekst.fritekst: For our client within the oil and gas industry, we are looking for a Process Engineer in a longterm assignment. The Process Engineer is a member of Norway Engineering Service, Process and HVR Team.

• Support delivery on established HSSE and Integrity performance objectives.
  • Responsible for identifying, reporting and initiate initial mitigation of potential risks within his/her area of responsibility.
  • Responsible for support with planning and preparing activities in compliance with klients governing documentation and external regulations relevant for HSSE and Integrity.
  • Responsible for deviation reporting, securing that unsafe behaviors and conditions, incidents, observed positive behaviors, improvement suggestions and non-conformances are reported.
  • Support the AST Process Engineer in providing input to the Field Depletion Plan and the Integrated Business Plan.
  • Support input to the Integrated Field Plan and other plans for Process Engineering Services activities.
  • Support for securing that the planning work process, is being followed consistently.
  • Responsible for setting objectives that are aimed at delivering the annual performance contract within his/her area of responsibility and for delivering on these objectives.
  • Responsible for ensuring that work within his/her area of responsibility is effectively scoped, managed and executed in accordance with agreed plans to achieve the overall objectives of the lients assets.
  • Support AST teams with Trouble shooting
  • Ensure support to Integrity Management
  • Prepare and Perform Hazops
  • HP/LP interface
  • Update Performance Standards and perform Barrier Mapping
· Documentation · Keep governing documents updated
  • Support Minor Modifications and Major Projects
  • Initiate, comment and approve AFA when this is required
  • Responsible for supporting the key work processes

• Minimum B.Sc. degree in Engineering. (Preferably Master of Science).
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in E&P activities.
  • Knowledge of /experience in common processes, with emphasis on OMS and CI.
  • Good knowledge of Norwegian and international regulations

• Strong commitment towards HSE agenda.
  • Personal drive and bias for action.
  • Strong commitment to activities and plan.
  • Good interpersonal skills
  • Proactively seeking advice from others and share own experiences within and outside the group.

bemanningsselskap.kommentar: ISS Personalhuset er et av Norges ledende bemanningsselskaper, og er en del av det verdensomspennende Facility Management-selskapet ISS. Vi har erfarne og høyt kvalifiserte medarbeidere, og tilbyr tjenester innen rekruttering, personalutleie og omstilling. Vi er landsdekkende med vel 100 ansatte fordelt på 22 avdelinger. For mer informasjon se www.personalhuset.no

enfritekst.fritekst: For our client within the oil and gas industry, we are looking for a Senior Completion Engineer in a longterm assignment. The Senior Completion Engineer / Completion Engineer is a member of the Norway Production Performance Unit and the Drilling and Wells function.

• Work as part of a multi discipline team to maximize project value through completion concept screening and selection ( Senior).
  • Provide cost benefit analysis and develops risk profiles for completion concepts being screened (Senior).
  • Develop basis for design, key design & procedures documents, execution plans and group loadings consistent with policy and local regulatory requirements.
  • Review and approve detailed completion and wellbore clean-out procedures (Senior)
  • Provide assurance that key technical risks and critical success factors are identified and managed
  • Lead risk assessment sessions and incorporate mitigation action plans into offshore procedures.
  • Assure that suppliers are aligned with well goals and objectives and that adequate QA/QC plans are in place and being followed by contractors.
  • Contract "owner" of specific completion contracts and support Team Leader in contract management of those including QPR’s (Senior)
  • Provide detailed cost estimates and schedule forecasts
  • Specifies equipment and services required to achieve the desired outcome and ensures adequate stock inventory in place to support the completion program.
  • Lead pre activity technical limit sessions with service providers.
  • Monitor, track and analyse performance.
  • Capture lessons learned and incorporates same into future activities and maintain technical procedures updated.
  • Provide onsite supervision and technical support when required.
  • Lead post job meetings with service providers (After Action Reviews).
  • Post job reporting including the Well Completion Documentation.
  • Approval/verification of requisitions and invoices.

• B.SC. or M.SC. in petroleum engineering/Relevant engineering degree
  • Technical training / competency as per CoL guidelines for discipline and position
  • In-depth knowledge of completion design and construction methods across a range of rig and well types.
  • Be able to utilse engineering tools and principles to be able to design all aspects of a well completion.
  • Experience as offshore completion supervisor
  • Basis Safety and Emergency Training in accordance with OLF guideline 002.
  • Hold a current IWCF well control certificate (i.e. no older than 2 years)
  • Valid Health Certificate for offshore work.
  • Minimum 8 years of experience within the drilling and completion discipline.

• Good communicator
  • Proactively seeking advise from others and share own experiences with group
  • Good knowledge of the English language

enfritekst.fritekst: For Ringnes søker vi etter en dyktig medarbeider. Stillingen utgjør ca 16 %. Så er du ute etter litt jobb ved siden av skole eller din daglige jobb, så kan dette være en mulighet.

• Utplassering av varer
  • Oppfølging av kunde og kampanjer
  • Ordreopptak og salg

• Erfaring fra bransjen
  • Selvstendig og strukturert
  • Sertifikat kl B, må benytte egen bil
Lønn etter tariff, en bransje i vekst og med stadig nye muligheter
Kun elektroniske søknader blir vurdert.

enfritekst.fritekst: For våre kunder i Stavanger og omegn er vi på jakt etter deg som liker å jobbe med mat, er dyktig på service og evner å sette kunden i fokus. Passer for studenter og de som ønsker å kombinere med en annen deltidsjobb.

• Daglig matproduksjon og renhold i kantinen.
  • Kassehåndtering, samt annet forefallende arbeid.
  • Løpende kundekontakt
Dagtid

• Du er ansvarsbevist og evner å arbeide selvstendig
  • Du liker å jobbe sammen med mennesker
  • Du trives med en tidvis hektisk arbeidsdag
  • Gode norskkunnskaper er en forutsetning

• Tariff lønn
  • Opplæring
  • Kurs
  • Godt arbeidsmiljø
Høres dette ut som noe for deg? Ring Marion Børnes på tlf. 98 29 51 76 eller send en henvendelse på e-post: marion.bornes@no.issworld.com

enfritekst.fritekst: For one of our client`s within the gas and oil industry, we are searching for a HSSE Advisor

Provide day to day HSE support to the Field Operations staff, onshore and offshore Monitor operation activities to ensure compliance with internal and external requirements, and initiate corrective actions when required Initiate and facilitate HAZID`s and MoC`s Initiate and lead investigations Follow up outstanding actions and ensure these are closed Support platform,to keep platform emergency procedures up-to date. Support and coordinate the platform Barrier mapping Close follow up trends and suggest actions to change negative trends Promote open communication and activities that achieves a motivated and enthusiastic workforce. Attack issues with the view to solve the basic causes in a systematic manner and drive for continuous improvements in all areas.
Minimum 7 years experience from operations or HSE areas Valid Offshore certificate required (incl. Medical)
Interpersonal skills Good communicator, proactively seeking advise from others and share own experiences with group Good coach Active listener Convincing authority

enfritekst.fritekst:
1. Serve as a principal resource to the HUC manager and organization within the HUC Phases to ensure facilities are installed and commissioned in accordance with client authorities’ requirements with respect to Process engineering content.
2. Provide a ‘first level’ Process Engineering resource with respect to day to day queries and issues.
3. Provide the Process TA with notification of significant issues including recommendations for their resolution.
4. Ensure process integrity is maintained at all times in the offshore environment and provide confirmation of this to the HUC Manager and the RFO team
5. Work within the HUC team to ensure process integrity issues are identified and mitigated within commissioning procedures and records
6. Provide a process engineering resource to ensure any incidents are fully assessed with recommendation being made to the Process TA and HUC manager.
7. Work within the clients team to ensure Process Integrity is maintained during transision between construction and commissioning, commissioning and start up , and Start up and early post project handover phases
8. Act as a available resource for the Process TA in his evaluation of commissioning, start-up and operating procedures

• Has a significant period of relevant industrial experience, (hands on, supervisory & technical support).
  • Has an accredited Engineering degree.
  • Has experience of commissioning a variety of Offshore systems with respect to Process Engineering content.
  • Understands the limits of own competence and who to contact within the discipline for technical advice and guidance.
  • Experience of working within a offshore based Team framework

• HSE leadership.
  • Clear understanding of project goals.
  • Able to deal with various , sometimes, conflicting priorities
  • Understanding and support of the customer and contractor’s requirements.
  • Taking responsibility.
  • Respect and encouragement to fellow workers.
  • Clear and effective communication, with bad news communicated early.
  • Attention to detail.

enfritekst.fritekst:
Vi søker flere kantinemedarbeidere til vikariater og på tilkalling i Østfold som vil satse på serviceyrket og som har følgende egenskaper: Egenskaper:
  • Åpen, blid og serviceinnstilt

  • Fleksibel og pålitelig

Ønsker du ytterligere informasjon om stillingen, vennligst ta kontakt med Mette Kristiansen tlf. 98402718.

bemanningsselskap.kommentar: ISS Personalhuset er et av Norges ledende bemanningsselskaper, og er en del av det verdensomspennende Facility Management-selskapet ISS. For mer informasjon se www.personalhuset.no

enfritekst.fritekst:
Ønsker du å ta del i et ung og lekent kjøkken, hvor all mat er 100 % selvprodusert, hvor du spiller på lag med lokale leverandører og hvor du store muligheter for utvikling? Vi søker deg som vil jobbe med flotte råvarer i et godt kjøkken og servere god mat forankret i lokal kultur og tradisjoner. For å utvikle og perfeksjonere vår kjøkkenavdeling, søker vi en kokk med snarlig tiltredelse. Våre kokker med fartstid fra topp restauranter i Norge og Sverige har skapt et åpent arbeidsmiljø hvor læring, samarbeid og utvikling av spennende menyer står i fokus. Vi lever i et skattekammer av lokale råvarer som vi ønsker å foredle. Våre lunsjer er basert på husmannskost, mens middagene på kveldstid og i selskaper er 4 retters meny med vekt på både gamle og moderne teknikker. Som kokk hos oss vil du få ta del i alle arbeidsoppgaver på kjøkkenet, med store muligheter for læring og utvikling.
  • Losji i personalbolig kan tilbys
  • Oppstart snarest mulig

• Kokk / kokkekyndig
  • Gjerne erfaring fra hotell / restaurant
  • God Norsk / Nordisk språk kunnskaper

• Sosial, utadvent og fleksibel
  • Serviceinnstilt og en god ambassadør
  • Ser løsninger fremfor problemer

• En flott arbeidsplass med godt arbeidsmiljø
  • Konkurransedyktige betingelser
  • Vi kan tilby losji i personalbolig

For å søke: Registrer din CV på www.personalhuset.no og søk på denne annonse.
For ytterligere informasjon kontakt: Richard Taylor. Mail: richard.taylor@no.issworld.com Tlf: 982 95 163
